name: Oh, a Platformer!
description:
This is another little project I made while trying to learn some game dev basics. It's a simple platformer game featuring coins, moving platforms and stuff that kills you :D

Play using WASD/ Arrow Keys

What to expect:

It starts off easy but it becomes really challenging after a while, you will have to get used to the 'feel' of the game.

The audio gives a really happy vibe that is contagious (at least it was for me)

Bugs may appear and may vary. (please report them to me)

The collisions are not perfect, you may run into stuff like the main character jumping away from a wall that was too close to him or getting stuck in the floor for a bit ( the latter is usually solved by waiting a second and jumping)

The asset pack used for the game was taken from the Unity Asset Store for free (you've probably seen it in other games). Credits to Bayat Games for a nice and easy to use Asset Pack.

I hope you enjoy this small game. I'm learning more and more with every little project I take on, and this was a blast to make.

Be sure to let me know how your experience was, I'm open to constructive feedback. Also, again, if you run into bugs, let me know!

Have a good one!
